name: Tic-Tac-Toe (Multiplayer)
description:
A Simple Tic-Tac-Toe, But added Multiplayer Support is never thought off..

So we present you the multiplayer tic tac toe where you can play either offline or online..

Developed by: Anoy RC

Further Aims:

1. Add UI

2. Add Challenges

Join our Discord Server - https://discord.io/asssgroup

Please Donate. It will help us release the game on Google Play Store.

:)
